examples: A lush, ambient soundscape featuring the serene sounds of a flowing river, complemented by the distant chirping of birds, and a gentle, melancholic piano melody that slowly unfolds.
prompt.description: The text prompt describing the music you want to generate
prompt.title: Prompt

seed.description: A seed for deterministic generation. If provided, the model will attempt to produce the same audio given the same prompt and other parameters.
seed.title: Seed

negative_prompt.description: A description of what to exclude from the generated audio
negative_prompt.title: Negative Prompt

file_size.description: The size of the file in bytes.
file_size.title: File Size

file_name.description: The name of the file. It will be auto-generated if not provided.
file_name.title: File Name

content_type.description: The mime type of the file.
content_type.title: Content Type

url.description: The URL where the file can be downloaded from.
url.title: Url
